name: Open Source Pop Guide
tagline: Open Source Resource Tool Kit for everything Pop Up
body:
# Future Cities Hackathon 

## What are our goals? 

Solve the property owner problem

## # What is the problem

They are loosing money 

They have empty property (Potential in a low footfall location) 

Need to let/sell property long term

## How are we going to solve the problem

MVP 

Pop Up Guide for Landlord 

Pop up guide for entrepreneurs

To sell to 2 Workshops

20 Landlord in Strategy lab

20 Entrepreneur in strategy lab

January 20th TBR 


One Product for one customer

What can we achieve in the next 48 hours? Actual 8 hours of work ? 

## One Source Pop Tools ? 

•	Tools to make popping up easy
•	Mapped resources and empty space  
•	Drag and drop paper work to 
•	Pop Up Community Developed tools 


## Challenges 

How open can we make empty space? Air bnb for the high street? 

How can we use data? 

How can this be scaled? 

The problem is more likely 

[IDEA]'s

Radically Open 

How to detect open space is open is open 

How do we accesss property developers? 


Who is the most important ( one) early adopter group? 

How will we reach them

Why would they get involved
